messages.title: Want to STOP Conservatives?
messages.content: With Labour in third place here in Watford Dorothy Thornhill can beat the Tories here.

messages.title: STOPPING the Tories in government
messages.content: Lib Dems in government have stopped nasty and damaging Tory plans for...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Record rise in the state pension

issues.education: Funding for struggling school kids. 1.9 million new apprenticeships.
issues.governance: Lib Dems in government have stopped nasty and damaging Tory plans for... allowing bosses to fire staff for no reason, paying local nurses and teachers less in London, letting our schools be run for a profit.
issues.socialWelfare: £800 tax cut for ordinary workers. Record rise in the state pension.

politicalExperience.achievements: Ten years as Mayor of Watford, Dorothy Thornhill has delivered a lot of changes for us...

images.caption: Dorothy Thornhill engaging with constituents and participating in local services.
